skills.name: Crystalline Thorns
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 0] Aim (up to 3s) and fire an arrow to deal 650.0% ATK of Physical DMG and create an explosion. The explosion deals 100.0% ATK of Physical DMG to nearby enemies and generates a crystalline force field that persists for 5s, reducing the Move Speed of enemies within it by 70%. Hitting a weakspot deals 750.0% DMG to the target, makes the explosion deal 50% ATK of bonus Physical DMG, and immobilizes enemies in the blast radius for 1s. Miss Pink Elfâ™ª equip bonus: If the target is carrying a Crystalline Seed, the explosion will spread seeds to surrounding enemies. The Weapon Active's CD and charging time depend on the shooting mode.

skills.name: Elven Love Song
skills.description: Using a Weapon Active or Charged ATK boosts Crit DMG by 20.0% for 3s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Charged ATKs deal 15% bonus Physical DMG.
